snippet.title: Final Fury Closed Beta Invitation | Game Play Trailer | Meta Quest 2
snippet.description:
Sign Up at - https://finalfuryvr.com/

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782760/

Inspired by classic arcade fighters, Final Fury takes you and your friends to a distant future where you’ll embody powerful combatants, each with their own distinct move sets and personalities, and battle it out in fierce, head-to-head matches.

Combat in Final Fury is more than just throwing punches, players can launch attacks using gesture-based controls. The precision required to chain combos, combined with the quick reflexes needed to counter incoming strikes, brings a unique layer of skill and strategy to the experience.

ROSTER OF FIGHTERS to choose from and master on your journey to become the champion!
COMPETITIVE MECHANICS for the most intense battles against other players or AI.
VISUALLY EPIC animations and environments built in the theme of the roster of fighters!
HEART PUMPING MUSIC to get you in the mood to blast your opponents with your fury!

- Fight against your friends in cross-platform Multiplayer
- Play your way through single player battles against AI to hone your skills
- Join the battle to rise up the ranks in multiplayer competitive mode

Final Fury is an upcoming VR game by Kluge Interactive, the studio that brought you Synth Riders.

#MetaQuest2 #VRGaming #Quest2
